```{r set up and import libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(viridis)
library(ggplot2)

here()
```

```{r read csv}
TX <- read.csv(here('./Data/Processed/outage_group_TX.csv'))
TX <- TX %>% 
  mutate(
    date = my(paste0(month, "-", year)))

```

```{r ggplot visualizations}
TX_outage_count <- ggplot(TX, 
                         aes(x = date,
                             y = outage_count,
                             color = as.character(year))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_colour_discrete(palette = 'Set1')
  
TX_outage_count  

TX_outage_duration <- ggplot(TX, 
                         aes(x = date,
                             y = max_outage_duration,
                             color = as.character(year)))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_colour_discrete(palette = 'Set1')
  # scale_color_viridis(option = "mako", direction = -1)
  
TX_outage_duration

TX_outage_weighted <- ggplot(TX, 
                         aes(x = date,
                             y = customer_weighted_hours,
                             color = year))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_color_viridis(option = "mako", direction = -1)+
  ylim(0,50000000)
  
TX_outage_weighted

```
